data.title: Great!
data.text: We had so much fun!  This was really clever and well thought out!  We can't wait to go back when they open up more rooms!

data.title: Such a fun time!
data.text: Had such a great time! We escaped The Study! The couple that owns the business are so nice and fun to talk to. Booking the adventure was easy. The clues were awesome and so much fun. I can't wait for the next room to open so we can go and try and escape! I would recommend this to everyone. I'm so excited we have one in Redlands!!

data.title: So much fun!
data.text: Great activity for all ages!  My group ranged from 14-61 yrs old.  We all worked together and solved the way out with 4 mins to spare! Well, ok we did have a little help from the birdie in the room, but boy he was sure crabby. LOL, definitely try this escape room with your friends and family!

data.title: Well designed, very authentic, and very challenging!!!
data.text: We loved this escape room and had a terrific time with our friends playing it!! It's in a great location in the historic downtown area of Redlands. The room is well designed, very authentic, had lots of intrigue and was very challenging! Loooved it!!!!

data.title: Exciting
data.text: This was my first time doing an escape room.  I had no idea how much fun this was going to be!  We had a group of 5- all new to the experience.  We escaped with 40 seconds left on the clock!  It was exciting to find the clues and put them together in time to escape.  I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for something fun and different to do in Redlands!  The place is awesome!

data.title: Great time!  We escaped!!
data.text: I have never done an escape room before but my friends inviting my husband and I to join them and we had a great time. It was really fun and the best news is we escaped!!  I would definitely recommend it!!
